name: Soda Can Strike -Skillz eSport
description:
*Thousands of real time tournaments played daily*

Throw for cash with Soda Can Strike! Skillz eSports Edition.

This special edition of Soda Can Strike features the Skillz game platform.

Strike cans down like a Pro with the best can striking physics and mechanics game on the AppStore. With some practice you will be competing with the best in the world.

Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! Skillz: eSports for Everyone.

Features
• Skillz game platform - Play for cash prizes against other players around the world.
• Realistic physics and easy to use control system - throw the ball with a flick of your finger.
• Running at 60FPS on all devices.
• Authentic gameplay.
• Challenging Levels
• Tuned for short burst gaming with super fast navigation.
